name: JJ Ant
comment: Took Grab car to and fro to Durain SS2 this afternoon.Managed to buy 7.5 Kg of Musang King durain for RM 160.00 paid by 2 accounts.The offer is around RM 20.00 per KG as not possible to get exactly 3 KG as weight varies in terms of sizes of each durainCould not order the 300 grams for RM 20.00 as it was sold out by 3.45 pm today.One's can only order if you are less than 7.5 km from DurainSS2 outlet.Musang King durain OK but still lose out to Thai Monthong and Golden Pillow durain.Will be in Bangkok next week for Thai durain which is still the best, follow by Musang King as alternative. name: JJ Ant
comment: Grab I have always like GRAB'S services and the Durainfest campaign is good and there room for further improvement for next year with removal of distance based criteria.It is just too expensive for One's to spend RM 50 - 65  on return taxi fares alone  just to participate in this offer excluding the cost to buy the durain which work out to well over RM 200 to buy 7.5 kgs including travelling cost.
